title.en: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney - Official Casebooks (Anthology)

altTitles.en: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Official Casebook: Vol. 1: The Phoenix Wright Files
Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Official Casebook: Vol. 2: The Miles Edgeworth Files

description.en:
Volume 1: The Phoenix Wright Files  
  
OBJECTION!  
  
Only one name strikes fear into the hearts of evildoers everywhere: Phoenix Wright, ace attorney. Join Phoenix Wright and his adorable assistant Maya–plus Miles Edgeworth, Detective Gumshoe, Franziska von Karma, and others–as they investigate twenty intriguing cases. And find out why Phoenix Wright has devoted his life to fighting injustice!  
  
Contents  
  
1. Progress Toward Tomorrow by Tamako Yamauchi  
2. Turnabout Interference by Kei Nisemura  
3. Turnabout Illusions by Seventh Gear  
4. A Small Case in a Small Office by Wataru Yamasaki  
5. Kind Lies by Tsubaki Mikage  
6. Turnabout Misunderstanding by Kaname Uchimura  
7. Motive Power by Naruzô  
8. Turnabout Day Off by Yûya Kurogami  
9. Turnabout Kitten by Natsu Otono  
10. Spirit Medium or Bust! by Kaoru Osada  
11. It's Not Easy Being A Defense Attorney by DAIGO  
12. A Turnabout Day Together by Masao Aona  
13. Turnabout? Food Fight by Yorozu  
14. Car Life, My Life by Tamako Yamauchi  
15. Ball Search Team, Head Out!! by Tomo  
16. The Legendary Defense Attorney by Kikuchiyo Anko  
17. Maya's Blue Skies by Wataru Yamasaki  
18. The Mystery of the Missing Manjû by Tsukapon  
19. Encounter with the Unknown by Rin Hashiba  
20. Turnabout Big Turnaround by Shinosuke  
21. Four-Panel Comic Strips by Kikuchiyo Anko, Aira Kanô, Kiyono Shimanda  
  
Volume 2: The Miles Edgeworth Files  
  
TAKE THAT!   
  
Phoenix Wright, ace attorney, has faced down many clever and corrupt prosecutors in the courtroom: Winston Payne, Manfred von Karma and his whip-cracking daughter, Franziska, and Godot. But only one is his true rival: the mysterious Miles Edgeworth. Get ready for these new stories of crime, justice, and courtroom drama!  
  
Contents  
  
1. Yesterday's Enemy, Today's ~~Friend~~ Enemy by Wataru Akizuki  
2. Over Again by Yûkô Yai  
3. Prosecutor's Lies by Usagi Hodogaya  
4. Turnabout Tomorrows by Lucy Tanaka  
5. Mr. Edgeworth's Turnabout Day Off by Akira Hôjô  
6. Distant Memories by Yunomi Hisamatsu  
7. Turnabout Day Off by Mami Tachibana  
8. Edgeworth's Affliction by Usagi Hodogaya  
9. A Spicy Turnabout by Hiro Tôge  
10. Dinner, Edgeworth Style by Yuka Kannoji  
11. Please Note Air Times!! by Yuka Kannoji  
12. Magnificent Curry Turnabout by Mami Tachibana  
13. Spring Is Here by Saki Ichijô  
14. Cold Game by Yûkô Yai  
15. Big Earthquake? Maya Cannon! by Reala Kasori  
16. Edgeworth's Agony by Harue Motegi  
17. Go Go!! Edgeworth!! by Zombi Chiryû  
18. Edgeworth, The Good Little Boy by Zombi Chiryo  
19. An Early Afternoon Case by Yako Fujimaru  
20. Miles Edgeworth: Defending Prosecutor by Rin Hashiba  
21. Friends in Futility by Yûkô Yai  
22. Four-Panel Comics by Kiyoro Shimanda
